name: Project:Blue
description:
Yo everyone!
I hope you all are doing well in this difficult times. We have been working on Project:Blue, a 3D Top Down Labyrinth Game.
Some of you have seen the original version that we've made in the Global Game Jam 2020 (neooutput.itch.io/project-blue), and today we'd like to show you a whole new prototype totally remade in Unreal Engine 4.

We want to continue developing the game, and hopefully release it one day. Your feedback would be highly appreciated.
Enjoy!
